txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Soft skin from the lizard-like creatures north of Oatbarton. You can make the delivery to Ponto Oats at Oatbarton centre.
'How strange, the skin is softer than it appears beneath the scales. Thank you.'
'Do you think that you could provide me with some of the skins from the lizard-like creatures to the north.'
The townsfolk in Oatbarton await the delivery of soft skin to Ponto Oats at the centre of the town.
Deliver the soft skin to Ponto Oats at Oatbarton
You have been tasked with collecting and delivering soft skin from the lizard-like creatures north of Oatbarton. You are to deliver the items to Ponto Oats at the centre of the town of Oatbarton.
Wanted: Soft skin from the lizard-like creatures north of Oatbarton.
